The class JSVGComponent throws a java.lang.InternalError in renderGVTTree(). An
application is not supposed to throw this exception (nor any other Error in
general).

text:
this concludes repair of this bug. After applying all patches, the bug can be
closed.
Summary: all InternalErrors have been replaced by IllegalStateExc,
IllegalArgumentExc or UnsupportedOperationExc, whichever was most appropriate.
All of them now give more information about the value which caused the exception.
Additionally, some case-fall-throughs were commented, trailing whitespace was
removed and some minor optimations were applied.
